item.title: Pulsar and Ros2
item.description: Introduction What is ROS 2 ROS means Robot Operating System (but it’s not an operating system) What you get Software libraries and tools for…
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

What is ROS 2

ROS means Robot Operating System (but it’s not an operating system)

What you get

  • Software libraries and tools for building robot applications

What is Apache Pulsar

Apache Pulsar is a cloud-native, distributed messaging and streaming platform.

Why not just use Kafka?

Why do I want to connect these two?

Next Steps
